short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Share and discover real purchases with friends.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bestfriends is a fun way for you to share what you buy online and discover products with your friends. 

Our platform automatically grabs the products you buy from Shopify merchants and posts them to your Bestfriends profile. No more annoying texts or email chains about what you bought!

Bestfriends encourage users to share their profiles and build lists of their favorite purchases. (Running training, street style, apartment essentials, etc.)

We're just getting started and will be building a ton more features to help you share and discover purchases!

Today's consumer brands are worth sharing, and our mission is to enable that behavior across all platforms.
